template.content:
FROM docker.m.daocloud.io/openjdk:8 LABEL maintainer="ThinkGem@163.com" ENV TZ "Asia/Shanghai" ENV LANG C.UTF-8 VOLUME /tmp
WORKDIR /app
#RUN mkdir WEB-INF #ADD jeesite.lic ./WEB-INF ADD ./maven/web.war ./app.war
#ENV JAVA_OPTS "$JAVA_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx1024m" ENV JAVA_OPTS "$JAVA_OPTS -Dspring.profiles.active=prod"
ENTRYPOINT if [ -f "app.war" ]; then jar -xvf app.war && rm app.war; \ fi && cd WEB-INF && sh startup.sh && cd WEB-INF && sh startup.sh
EXPOSE 8983
#docker run -p 8983:8983 thinkgem/jeesite-cloud-module-${moduleCode}:5.0
